description: Model detailing available configuration options for plaintext_tcp.

PLAINTEXT_TCP_CHECKIN_FREQUENCY.description: The frequency with which to start the TCP listener.
PLAINTEXT_TCP_CHECKIN_FREQUENCY.title: Plaintext Tcp Checkin Frequency

PLAINTEXT_TCP_LISTEN_TIMEOUT.description: The timeout duration of a single listener.
PLAINTEXT_TCP_LISTEN_TIMEOUT.title: Plaintext Tcp Listen Timeout

PLAINTEXT_TCP_LISTEN_BIND_HOST.description: The host to bind to when setting up any listener.
PLAINTEXT_TCP_LISTEN_BIND_HOST.title: Plaintext Tcp Listen Bind Host

PLAINTEXT_TCP_LISTEN_RECV_PORT.description: The port to bind to when receiving messages.
PLAINTEXT_TCP_LISTEN_RECV_PORT.title: Plaintext Tcp Listen Recv Port

PLAINTEXT_TCP_LISTEN_SEND_PORT.description: The port to bind to when sending messages via a listener.
PLAINTEXT_TCP_LISTEN_SEND_PORT.title: Plaintext Tcp Listen Send Port

PLAINTEXT_TCP_INITIATE_RECV_HOST.description: When receiving messages by initiating a connection, the host to connect to.
PLAINTEXT_TCP_INITIATE_RECV_HOST.title: Plaintext Tcp Initiate Recv Host

PLAINTEXT_TCP_INITIATE_RECV_PORT.description: When receiving messages by initiating a connection, the port to connect to.
PLAINTEXT_TCP_INITIATE_RECV_PORT.title: Plaintext Tcp Initiate Recv Port

PLAINTEXT_TCP_USE_LISTENER_TO_SEND.description: Whether to send messages via a listener.
PLAINTEXT_TCP_USE_LISTENER_TO_SEND.title: Plaintext Tcp Use Listener To Send

PLAINTEXT_TCP_INITIATE_SEND_HOST.description: The target host when sending messages by initiating connections.
PLAINTEXT_TCP_INITIATE_SEND_HOST.title: Plaintext Tcp Initiate Send Host

PLAINTEXT_TCP_INITIATE_SEND_PORT.description: The target port when sending messages by initiating connections.
PLAINTEXT_TCP_INITIATE_SEND_PORT.title: Plaintext Tcp Initiate Send Port

title: PlaintextTCPConfig
